author: NuSan
code:
function update()
 local t=getTime()
 local pcount=1000
 for i=0,pcount do
   local f=i/pcount
   local v=f*500.0+t
   local d=0.0+pow(f,0.5)*0.6*(1+sin(f*6.25+t*2)*0.8)
   local px=cos(v)*d
   local py=sin(v)*d
   py = py*sin(px*2.0+t)
   point(px, py, abs(sin(f*500.0)))
 end
end
